plot: Jordi is playing his weekly poker game with friends and he forgets about the dinner for two that his girlfriend, Celia, is preparing him in order to celebrate their anniversary. Celia doesn't put up with his disrespect and she leaves him. Jordi, disconcerted, goes out and gets drunk and meets an enigmatic woman.   Written by
title: No se puede tener todo
